Text: hey, doesn't seem to open with any of my programs. never heard of a .dmg file before - what do you use to run it?!
this file is a fucking waste of time and bandwidth unless you have a mac. tried converting with poweriso, dmg2iso ans also isobuster - no joy with any. dont bother if you have winxp

In Linux:
mkdir /mnt/dmg
dmg2img -i file.dmg -o stage1.img
mount -t hfsplus -o loop stage1.dmg /mnt/dmg
DVD files are now in /mnt/dmg/VIDEO_TS
